title: Modulations
creator_credit: Judith Klein, Pierre Moretti and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A film of playful observation, without commentary, catching in a few simple animated line drawings the image people project of themselves in the way they dress or move. Different types of people - plump dowager, curvaceous dancer, kilted Scot, ancient Egyptian - all make their bid for attention, metamorphosing one from the other in surprising ways. Music by Gordon Fleming, Herbert Spanier, Michel Donato and Eric MacDonald. Camera by Pierre Provost.
